original: 此為中國史上極為嚴重的皇族內亂之一，史稱「八王之亂」，持續了好幾十年，最終由東海王司馬越取得了晉朝朝政的主導權。
text: This is one of the most serious imperial civil turmoil in Chinese history. It was called the "Eight Kings Rebellion" in history and lasted for several decades. Eventually, Sima Yue, king of the East China Sea, took the lead in the Jin Dynasty.
